problem_names:
lemma unfoldE:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   s :: "(name \<times> name) list"

  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>]"
  and   "Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]"

lemma unfoldI:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "\<forall>s. P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>] \<and> Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]"

  shows "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

lemma weakCongWeakEq:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<simeq> Q"

lemma eqvtI:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   perm :: "name prm"

  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "(perm \<bullet> P) \<simeq>\<^sup>s (perm \<bullet> Q)"

lemma strongEqWeakCong:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

lemma congSubstBisimSubst:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s P"

lemma symetric:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"
  
  shows "Q \<simeq>\<^sup>s P"

lemma transitive:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"
  and     "Q \<simeq>\<^sup>s R"
  
  shows "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s R"

lemma partUnfold:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   s :: "(name \<times> name) list"

  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P[<s>] \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q[<s>]"
translations:
lemma unfoldE:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   s :: "(name \<times> name) list"

  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>]"
  and   "Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>] &&&
    Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>]
 2. Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]

proof (state)
this:
  Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma unfoldI:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "\<forall>s. P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>] \<and> Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]"

  shows "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>s.
     P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>] \<and>
     Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>s.
     P[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q[<s>] \<and>
     Q[<s>] \<leadsto><weakBisim> P[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

goal:
No subgoals!

goal (1 subgoal):

goal (1 subgoal):

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.

          a[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> b[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       a \<approx> b

goal (1 subgoal):

goal (1 subgoal):

lemma weakCongWeakEq:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<simeq> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> Q

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>\<sigma>.
       P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
    P \<simeq> Q

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<[]>] \<simeq> Q[<[]>] \<Longrightarrow> P \<simeq> Q

lemma eqvtI:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   perm :: "name prm"

  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "(perm \<bullet> P) \<simeq>\<^sup>s (perm \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. perm \<bullet> P \<simeq>\<^sup>s perm \<bullet> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. perm \<bullet> P \<simeq>\<^sup>s perm \<bullet> Q

lemma strongEqWeakCong:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q
by(force intro: strongBisimWeakEq simp add: substClosed_def congruenceSubst_def)

lemma congSubstBisimSubst:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q
by(force simp add: congruenceSubst_def substClosed_def intro: congruenceWeakBisim)

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?P \<approx> ?P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. P \<leadsto><weakBisim> P

proof (state)
this:
  ?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq>\<^sup>s P

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq>\<^sup>s P

proof (state)
this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s P

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma symetric:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"
  
  shows "Q \<simeq>\<^sup>s P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<simeq>\<^sup>s P

lemma transitive:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"
  and     "Q \<simeq>\<^sup>s R"
  
  shows "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s R"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q
  Q \<simeq>\<^sup>s R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq>\<^sup>s R
by(force simp add: congruenceSubst_def substClosed_def intro: Weak_Late_Cong.transitive)

lemma partUnfold:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   s :: "(name \<times> name) list"

  assumes "P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P[<s>] \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q[<s>]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<s>] \<simeq>\<^sup>s Q[<s>]

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>s. P[<s>] \<simeq> Q[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>s. P[<s>] \<simeq> Q[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<(s @ s')>] \<simeq> Q[<(s @ s')>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] \<simeq> Q[<(s @ s')>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] \<simeq> Q[<(s @ s')>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q[<(s @ s')>] = Q[<s>][<s'>]

proof (state)
this:
  Q[<(s @ s')>] = Q[<s>][<s'>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<s>][<\<sigma>>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<\<sigma>>]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] \<simeq> Q[<(s @ s')>]
  P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]
  Q[<(s @ s')>] = Q[<s>][<s'>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  P[<(s @ s')>] \<simeq> Q[<(s @ s')>]
  P[<(s @ s')>] = P[<s>][<s'>]
  Q[<(s @ s')>] = Q[<s>][<s'>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<s>][<s'>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<s'>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<s>][<s'>] \<simeq> Q[<s>][<s'>]

goal:
No subgoals!
